name: Mickey & Donald
description:
Playable 3D simulation of this   classic handheld electronic game including views of the original packaging and instruction guide . A RetroFab simulation Version 0.9.5 (beta) Details Title Mickey & Donald Model No. DM-53 Series Game & Watch ( Multi Screen ) Manufacturer Nintendo Release Date November 12, 1982 Chipset Sharp SM511 ( 32.768 kHz ) Description

Mickey Mouse and Donald Duck fight a raging fire in this multi-screen edition of Nintendo's Game & Watch series of handheld LCD games.

Gameplay

Mickey Mouse and Donald Duck are trying to put out a fire that is climbing up a tall building. Donald is on the roof and must move left or right to fight the fire by pouring water down on to the flames. Mickey must move up and down a ladder to plug any leaks that occur when a large volume of water passes through the hose. When the hose is leaking no water will reach Donald.

Tips
  • A water leak is not a miss, but when the hose is leaking Donald won't get any water on the roof. To prevent leaks in the first place keep an eye out for the large bulges of water moving through the hose. If Mickey reaches a patch when the bulge passes it he can prevent the leak and force the water to keep flowing through the hose
     
  • Goofy slows down pumping water whenever Mickey is not ordering him to keep pumping. When moving Mickey up and down the ladder to plug a leak be sure to return him as quickly as possible to the truck to ensure Goofy starts pumping faster again.
     
  • If Donald is able to put out the fire at the base of a column no more flames will rise up from that column leaving Donald time to focus on the other columns.
Controls Keyboard Up W or Up Arrow Down S or Down Arrow Left A or Left Arrow Right D or Right Arrow Mouse Rotate Drag Press Left-click Zoom Mousewheel Resources Audio David Haywood ( youtube.com ) Box Art Nintandbox ( nintandbox.net ) Instructions Torsten Lindh ( intheattic.co.uk ) Textures Lee Robson ( progettosnaps.net )
